1.1.1.1.1.1.1. shapepipe.modules.PSFExInterpolation_package.interpolation_script module¶

INTERPOLATION SCRIPT

This module computes the PSFs from a PSFEx model at several galaxy positions.

Was using Erin Sheldon & Eli Rykoff’s psfex module, available on GitHub at: https://github.com/esheldon/psfex

Author

Morgan Schmitz

Version

1.2.0

Date

06/02/2018

shapepipe.modules.PSFExInterpolation_package.interpolation_script.interpsfex(dotpsfpath, pos)[source]¶

Use PSFEx generated model to perform spatial PSF interpolation.

Parameters

  • dotpsfpath (string) – Path to .psf file (PSFEx output).

  • pos (np.ndaray) – Positions where the PSF model should be evaluated.

Returns

PSFs – Each row is the PSF imagette at the corresponding asked position.

Return type

np.ndarray

class shapepipe.modules.PSFExInterpolation_package.interpolation_script.PSFExInterpolator(dotpsf_path, galcat_path, output_path, img_number, pos_params=None, get_shapes=True)[source]¶

Bases: object

Interpolator class.

This class uses a PSFEx output file to compute the PSF at desired positions.

Parameters

  • dotpsf_path (str) – Path to PSFEx output file.

  • galcat_path (str) – Path to SExtractor-like galaxy catalog.

  • output_path (str) – Path to folder where output PSFs should be written.

  • pos_params (list, optional) – Desired position parameters. If provided, there should be exactly two, and they must also be present in the galaxy catalog. Otherwise, they are read directly from the .psf file.

_get_position_parameters()[source]¶

Read position parameters from .psf file.

_get_galaxy_positions()[source]¶

Extract galaxy positions from galaxy catalog.

_interpolate()[source]¶

(Run Sheldon & Rykoff’s PSFEx interpolator method at desired positions.)

_get_psfshapes()[source]¶

Compute shapes of PSF at galaxy positions using HSM.

write_output()[source]¶

Save computed PSFs to fits file.
